dcterms:description: The LA dataset consists of 1003 3D gadolinium-enhanced MR imaging volumes with manual left atrial annotations, featuring an anisotropic resolution of 0.625 × 0.625 × 0.625 mm³.
dcterms:title: Left Atrial Dataset (LA)

dcterms:description: The NIH Pancreas Dataset comprises 82 abdominal CT volumes with manual pancreas annotations.
dcterms:title: NIH Pancreas Dataset
